reminder.title: {siteName} Trial Reminder
reminder.message: Your {siteName} trial period is ending soon. Subscribe now to keep enjoying all features.

expired.title: {siteName} Trial Expired
expired.message: Your {siteName} trial period is expired. Subscribe now to keep enjoying all features.

reminder.title: {siteName} Payment Reminder
reminder.message: Just a reminder that your {siteName} subscription is ending soon.

message.due: Your {name} subscription payment ({price}) is due now!

languages.notAvailableMessage: Language preferences cannot be changed because functional cookies are disabled and you're not signed in. To change the language, you need to either:

hero.badge: Want to take control of your expenses?
hero.title: Smart Subscription Management Made Easy
hero.subtitle: {appName} helps you track subscriptions, monitor recurring expenses, and get payment reminders in one powerful and human readable dashboard.
hero.tagline: Get notified and never miss a payment again.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your subscriptions effectively

billingCycles.title: Flexible Billing Cycles
billingCycles.description: Support for monthly, yearly, and custom billing intervals

notifications.title: Smart Notifications
notifications.description: Get timely reminders for payments and trial ends

reports.title: Reports & Insights
reports.description: Track your spending with detailed reports and insights

currencies.title: Multiple Currencies
currencies.description: Support for multiple currencies with real-time cost tracking

timezone.title: Timezone Support
timezone.description: Track subscriptions across different timezones with automatic date conversions

categories.title: Category Management
categories.description: Organize subscriptions with custom categories and color coding

step1.title: Sign Up & Login
step1.description: Create an account or login to start tracking your expenses

step2.title: Set Up Notifications
step2.description: Customize alerts for upcoming payments and trial end dates via email, push and webhook notifications

step3.title: Track & Optimize
step3.description: Monitor spending patterns and get insights to reduce unnecessary subscription costs

meta.title: Page Not Found

dataExport.description: Download a copy of your subscriptions, categories, payment methods and settings

login.description: Sign in with your email to access your account or create a new one automatically

otp.instructions: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email

toast.success: Welcome! You have successfully signed in.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.description: Track and manage all your subscriptions with powerful features at an affordable price

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information.
introduction.paragraph2: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our subscription and expense management service.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.description: We collect only the necessary information required to provide you with our services:

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: Your information is used exclusively for:

items.improving: Improving our services through anonymous usage analysis

paymentProcessing.title: Payment Processing
paymentProcessing.description: We use <paddle>Paddle.com</paddle> as our payment processing system. When you make a payment, your payment information is collected and processed directly by Paddle. We do not store your payment details on our servers. For information about how Paddle processes your data, please refer to <privacy>Paddle's Privacy Policy</privacy>.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We implement robust security measures to protect your personal information. We never share your data with third parties and maintain strict data protection protocols to prevent unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse of your information.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: We use a custom analytics tool to improve our services. This tool collects anonymous usage data to help us understand how users interact with our platform and enhance the user experience.

contactUs.description: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact us using the <link>contact form</link>.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the effective date.

refundPolicy.introduction: Bad refund policies are infuriating. You feel like the company is just trying to rip you off. We never want our customers to feel that way, so our refund policy is simple: If you're ever unhappy for any reason, just <link>contact us</link> and tell us what's up, and we'll work with you to make sure you're happy.

items.charged: If you were just charged for your next month of service but you meant to cancel, we're happy to refund that extra charge

items.week: If you were charged for a month of service but you only used it for a week, we'll refund the difference
items.year: If you were charged for a year of service but you only used it for a month, we'll refund the difference
items.weekDuplicate: If you were charged for a month of service but you only used it for a week, we'll refund the difference

termsOfService.welcome: Welcome to the {siteName} website (the "Site"). By accessing or using the Site, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions ("Terms of Service").

overview.title: Overview
overview.paragraph1: {siteName} offers this Site, including all information, tools, and services available from this Site to you, the user, conditioned upon your acceptance of all terms, conditions, policies, and notices stated here.
overview.paragraph2: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before accessing or using the Site. By accessing or using any part of the Site, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you may not access the Site or use any services. If these Terms of Service are considered an offer, acceptance is expressly limited to these Terms of Service.
overview.paragraph3: Any new features or tools which are added to the Site shall also be subject to the Terms of Service. You can review the most current version of the Terms of Service at any time on this page. Site reserves the right to update, change or replace any part of these Terms of Service by posting updates and/or changes to the Site. It is your responsibility to check this page periodically for changes. Your continued use of or access to the Site following the posting of any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.

websiteTerms.title: Website Terms
websiteTerms.paragraph1: By agreeing to these Terms of Service, you represent that you are at least the age of majority in your state or province of residence, or that you are the age of majority in your state or province of residence and you have given us your consent to allow any of your minor dependents to use this site.
websiteTerms.paragraph2: The use of our services must comply with all applicable laws and regulations. Specifically:

items.unlawful: You agree not to use our products for any unlawful or unauthorized purposes
items.comply: You must comply with all laws in your jurisdiction, including copyright and intellectual property laws
items.malicious: You may not transmit malicious code, viruses, or other harmful content

websiteTerms.paragraph3: Please note that any violation of these Terms of Service will lead to immediate termination of your access to our Services.

payment.title: Payment
payment.paragraph1: If you purchase a subscription to the Site, you agree to pay the applicable fees as indicated during the checkout process.
payment.paragraph2: We use <paddle>Paddle.com</paddle> as our payment service provider. By making a purchase, you also agree to Paddle's <terms>Terms of Service</terms>. Paddle processes all payments and handles the related customer service inquiries.
payment.paragraph3: Site process refunds according to our <refund>refund policy</refund>.

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.description: Site uses cookies and similar technologies (such as local storage) to track your usage of the Site and for marketing purposes. By using the Site, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with our <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All content on the Site, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, videos, and course content, is the property of the Site or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, modify, distribute, or otherwise use any content on the Site without our prior written consent.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: The information and content on the Site are provided for informational purposes only and are not intended as professional advice. Site makes no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the accuracy, reliability, completeness, or suitability of the information and content on the Site. You use the Site at your own risk.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: {siteName} shall not be held responsible for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages that may occur from your use of the Site, regardless of whether such damages arise from contract, tort, negligence, strict liability, or any other legal theory. The maximum amount Site may be liable for in any claim related to the Site is limited to the total subscription fees you have paid in the last 12 months.

changes.title: Changes to the Terms of Service
changes.description: Site may update or modify these Terms of Service from time to time, and any changes will be effective upon posting on the Site. Your continued use of the Site after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised Terms of Service.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.description: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless {siteName}, its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, agents, and licensors from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses, including without limitation reasonable attorney's fees, arising out of or in connection with your use of the Site, your violation of these Terms of Service, or your violation of any rights of another party.

modifications.title: Modifications to the Service and Prices
modifications.paragraph1: Prices for our services are subject to change without notice. Site reserves the right at any time to modify or discontinue the Service (or any part or content thereof) without notice at any time.
modifications.paragraph2: Site shall not be liable to you or to any third-party for any modification, price change, suspension, or discontinuance of the Service.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.description: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where {siteName} is headquartered without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law. You agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that jurisdiction for any disputes arising out of or in connection with these Terms of Service or your use of the Site.

entireAgreement.title: Entire Agreement
entireAgreement.description: These Terms of Service constitute the entire agreement between you and {siteName} regarding your use of the Site and supersede all prior and contemporaneous agreements and understandings, whether oral or written, relating to the same subject matter.

severability.title: Severability
severability.description: If any provision of these Terms of Service is found to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect.

waiver.title: Waiver
waiver.description: The failure of {siteName} to enforce any right or provision of these Terms of Service shall not constitute a waiver of that right or provision.

contactUs.description: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms of Service, please contact us using the <link>contact form</link> on the Site.

test.title: {siteName} Test Notification
test.message: This is a test notification from {siteName}. If you are seeing this, it means push notifications are working correctly!

email.footer: This is a friendly reminder email from {siteName}.

modal.title: Stay updated
modal.description: Get timely reminders about your subscription payments and due dates. We'll notify you before payments are due and when subscriptions are about to expire.

toast.error: Failed to enable notifications. Please try again.

permissionRequired.title: Permission Required
permissionRequired.description: Please allow notifications to receive reminders.

unknown.step2: The option is usually found in the main menu (often represented by three dots or lines)
unknown.step3: Follow your browser's specific installation prompts
